description: Warmth should be one benefit of your bottoms, not the only. This pant comes with a tally of functionality-forward features for when you need a place to carry keys on a walk to the dog park or fuel to stay recharged on cross-country tours and hikes, while keeping it incognito as a streamlined, straight-leg style you'll wear daily.
name: Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Pants, Reg - Mens
